issue.title: Label of a resource type relation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In the metadata form, for a field of type child resource (ex : contact), the label is hard coded as "Name".

If we fix it to the relation label, the label is repeated 3 time... (cf attached image). I suggest to remove the label for this type of relation.

What do you think?

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

You propose to remove the third label only, right ?

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Fixed and ready to be merged for 4.2.0 RC1

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Such issue may be defined as a defect instead of a new feature.
Thanks Thomas for your fix!

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Checking metadata content when editing focus on a label to highlight encountered error.
So "Name" has been changed in "Resource", as a label must be kept...
